name: SANTHI MEDICAL INFORMATION CENTRE
briefDescription: Facilitated kidney transplants for 640 patients, 62 from the Gulf.Facilitated heart surgeries for 20,500 patients, 184 from the Gulf. 	Dialysis Unit for the less privileged. 1, 50,000 Dialysis carried out in 10 years in Trichur, Palakkad, Kunnamkulam, puthanpally, chalakudy, waynad , kothamangalam and in our two mobile Dialysis units.	Mobilized Poor patientâ€™s treatment fund for more than IRS80/Million from the Central Government and charitable institutions in India. 	Provides Mobile Lab facilities in rural areas of Kerala Inaugurated by Bharath Suresh Gopi 	Provides medical information for more than 100 persons daily and guided by Phone, Letter and E-Mail. 	Publishes a Health Magazine in Malayalam.
